# GRIM statistics

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

This repo contains early ideas for statistical analyses of the results of [GRIM-testing](https://lhdjung.github.io/scrutiny/articles/grim.html).

Currently featured:

-   Binomial test to assess whether summary statistics are more often GRIM-consistent than expected under randomness
